virtual ~SetLanguageAction ()

Detailed Description

Obsolete - use a simple Action instead and change the language by overwriting the method Window::OnActionExecuted.

Sets the language of the application to the language provided by the constructor or the method Init.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SetLanguageAction::SetLanguageAction (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.
